# DISPLAY_DEVICE Equality operator

Implement the equality operator (==).

```csharp
public static bool operator ==(DISPLAY_DEVICE left, DISPLAY_DEVICE right)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| left | Operand 1. |
| right | Operand 2. |

## Return Value

Returns true if `deviceInfo1` is equal to `deviceInfo2`; false otherwise.
